text:
Whitney Cummings (born September 4, 1982) is an American stand-up comedian, actress, producer, writer, director, and podcaster. She is known for her comedy specials with "Comedy Central Roasts". She created, produced, and starred in NBC's "Whitney". The series ran for two seasons before being cancelled in 2013.
Cummings created the CBS sitcom "2 Broke Girls", which also began in 2011, and ended in 2017.
